title: Kei Yamagata | Front-end developer
description: As a dedicated front-end developer with 2 years of experience, based in beautiful Antwerp, Belgium, I specialise in creating modern, responsive websites and web applications using React and Vue.js. Collaboration is a key aspect of my work, and I thrive as part of a team. Working closely with experienced developers not only enhances my knowledge but also enables me to share my enthusiasm for front-end development. Explore my expertise in web development and see how I can contribute to your projects.
